E si tu no pauses le plom, ja es possible que la urina la qual va sobre le loc, no leysa aquest claure.	If you do not hold the lead nail, the urine that goes over the place may not leave this closure.
Mays aquel del qual le trauc es streyt sia medicat am clavil de Plom, ayssi cum havem dit, per trops dias entro que sia amplificat.	The one from which he was cut should be treated with a lead nail, as we said before, for three days or until it is enlarged.
Mays aquels en les quals es le trauc no en son loc, so leditz, la qual causa es quar de aquels, aquel que es nat e·l trau es deves la fi del cap de la vergua per que no pot urinar a las partidas dedintz, entro que eleva la vergua am la sua ma a las partidas desus; e no es a lu generacio, per so quar le sperma no pot pervenir a la mayre segon rectitut, e es malautia mot laga.	The ones from which he was not cut are left untreated, and the cause is because of these, that man who was born with the birth mark should lift his hand to his chest; and this is not done, for semen cannot reach the mother according to its natural course, and it becomes a disease.
E la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que·l malaute sia envessat sobre le sieu dos, e aprop exten le cap de la vergua de lu am la tua ma sinistra am vehement extraccio, e inscideys le cap del cap de la vergua del loc del perpucii am spatum agut, ayssi cum es inscizio de pluma, o que tu ne razas alcuna partida, per so que·l mieg de lu vengua semblant al cap de la vergua e que le trauc caia en le mieg loc segon que cove.	And the way of the operation on him is that the patient be placed on his back, and the head of the penis is extended from the patient's right side with a violent extraction, and the top of the penis at the place of the perineum is cut with a sharp knife, or so that you do not shave any part, in order that the foreskin of him comes out resembling the head of the penis, and that the birth mark falls into its place according to how it is covered.
E guarda te que en la tua operacio de flux de sanc, quar motas vetz accideys aquo; e pausa te a lu am aquo que abscindeys le sanc, e cura la plagua entro que si’ sanada.	And be careful that in your operation of a cut wound, because it is likely to happen that the blood flows out; and stop him from bleeding by applying pressure until he is healed.
Capitol .lvi.	Chapter LVI.
De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	Of the birthmark that happens in the foreskin on the head of the penis and of the corruption, darkness, and adhesion of the foreskin on the head of the penis.
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	These birthmarks may occur on the penis and are bumps of flesh.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	And one is evil, and the other is not.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	Not evil, but cut it off with a very small knife and let it fall away; then apply the oil of Egypt to that spot, and there is no need to use any other medicine; heal with this.
E si albater es maligna, de lega color, lahoras cove que tu aministres cauteri aprop la inscizio de lu e la razio de lu.	And if the birthmark is evil, of a white color, then cut it off; but, if it is of a dark color, then apply heat to the incision and rub it.
Mays si albater es en le prepuci del cap de la vergua no-circumcis, e la una partida de albater es dedintz le prepucii e l’autra partida es defora, lahoras cove que tu ostes albater le qual es dedintz al comensament entro que es consolidat; e lahora tu cura aquel deforo, quar quan tu curas aquel ensemps le prepuci, no es asegurat que no sia trinquat.	If the birthmark is in the foreskin on the head of the penis, and one part is inside the foreskin and the other part is outside, then cut off the one that is outside; but if you want to keep that one, which is inside at first, until it is hardened, then heal the one that is outside, because when you heal that one, it is not certain that it will not be torn.
E ja eysamen accideys en les genetius e en le prepuci negror e corruccio, adonc cove que tu conquavas tot aquo que ja es denigrat e que ja se vol corrompre o que ja es corrumput; e aprop lineys sobre aquel aprop aquo am mel, le qual es contusit am farina de scorsa de milgrana e de errs trissatz e crivellatz.	And these things also happen in the genitals and in the foreskin that becomes dark and corrupts; then cut off all of it that is already corrupted and turning black, or that has already become corrupted; and apply to that oil made from a piece of bread with three eggshells ground up and mixed into it.
E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	And heal that other one with any other medicine until it is healed.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	If there is bleeding from the wound, then apply lunar heat according to this form:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	Because two types of heat are useful, one for treating bleeding and the other for treating corruption when it has become corrupted.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	And if the head of the penis is torn and completely destroyed in an hour, then insert a lead pipe into the meat of the foreskin with a hole made through it so that the urine passes through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the adhesion of the foreskin to the head of the penis (and this adhesion does not happen except in that which has the foreskin, and from it the head of the penis is completely separated), cut off with a sharp knife until it is dissolved and the head of the penis is completely freed.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	And if it is difficult to cut those accurately, then cut off with a sharp knife any cause on the head of the penis and on the foreskin, and when it is very small, it is easily pierced by the sharp edge of the skin.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	And separate between the foreskin and the head of the penis with a lead thread that is very thin; it will easily slide into the water and not adhere to anything else.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	And heal it with vi stiptic until it has hardened.
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter LVII.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	Of the cleansing of children and of the treatment of urine that happens to those who are circumcised.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not the solution for continence except with other medicines; but because it is part of our operation and our will, and because that one is especially suitable for children, we must assign this best operation and make it lighter so that it may lead to salvation.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	So I say that the children do not say circumcision in some of the free nations, because they do not observe it in their laws, and this is only because we have acquired by experiment that this causes many craftsmen and barbers to practice circumcision and purification with a knife and a scalpel; and they use a thread with a hook and incise with a needle.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	I have seen all of these ways and I do not find any better purification with scissors, with a thread that is used in purification with a needle, because the thread that is tied around the foreskin has two ends, and the loop that comes from it falls away; and the thread that is tied around the foreskin becomes tight around it, and this causes pain unless it is cut.
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	And the purification that is done by an apprentice, which is manual, and of which barbers make use, is not secure for the cutting of the extremities of the male member, because it goes into the hole very easily.
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	But in the operation with a scalpel, one can easily damage and corrupt your operation.
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the loop of a child is short by nature, and such that there is no need for purification, and I have seen it.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	More of the purification that is done with scissors and a thread than by cutting it with a sharp knife, for when the sharpness of the knife goes away, it is so because it goes into the hole, and therefore you should make a comparison in time; and this causes a compression of the string around the head of the penis completely, and this is where the loop does not come out; and this is how you do a cut that makes no mistake.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	And the first method of operation is that you should stay with the child while it is still young, and if it is small, do not cut the string from the head of the penis until the next day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	And then place him on his back in that way, which is most likely for him to accept intelligence.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	And then place him on his back with the head supported and not leaning; and hide the scissors in your hand or leave them somewhere where the child does not see them and nobody else sees them.
E aprop entremet la tua ma a la vergua de lu e suffla en la codena, e tira aquela entro que sia eyssit le cap de la vergua, e aprop mondifica aquel de aquo que es agregat en ela de sordicia.	Then put your hand on the head of the penis and blow into the loop, and pull it until it is stretched; then purify that which has been attached to it by impurity.
E aprop lia le loc signat am fiel dobla, e aprop ligua pus bas de aquel un petit le segon liament, e aprop te am le dit pous e endic tieu le loc del liament dejos am bona retencio, e inscideys entre dos liaments.	Then turn the loop of thread twice around your hand, and then tie it tightly with another string; then place it on top of the first string, and secure it well, and then cut between those two strings.
E aprop eleva la codena sus leugierament e estratz le cap de la vergua; e aprop leyssa le sanc corre petit e petit, quar es milhor ; e pausa polvera desus e sobre la polvera pausa drap en le qual es spandut mugol de huou coyt en ayguaros concosit am oli rozat recent bo; e layssa aquel sobre aquel entro al autra dia; e cura aquel am curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then raise the cord by means of a lever and remove the head of the hammer; and then leave it to cool slowly, because it is better so; and sprinkle dust over it and on top of the dust put cloth in which molasses was mixed with a little olive oil that has been recently roasted; and then leave it like this for another day; and care for that with cure until it is healed.
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The shape of the forceps for dissection, this is the shape:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	If the extremities are not sharp and the others are, so that the claw of the hand does not pass through it; and if the length of the two is equal to the length of two fingers joined together.
Mays la error en mundificacio es quar fort leu efugeys la codena intrinseca tota, o partida de lu deves la inscizio.	The mistake in dissection is that if you pull too much of the internal cord, all of it will come out; or, if you only cut part of it, then you should make the incision.
Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Then, when you have extended that to your finger tip at the joint of the hand in front of the opening; and then cut it according to the second equality.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	And if you cannot hold that to your finger tip; then remove it with a blade and cut it.
Mays si son passatz tres dias, e roman aquo que es imflat dejos la vergua apostemat, lahoras tu leyssa aquo entro que sia cedat le apostema caut, e excorja aquel am fecilitat, e inscidex aquel segon que a tu es preparat.	If they have passed three days, and it remains swollen; then leave the hammer in place; but cut off that with ease, and cut it according to the second preparation.
E guarda te del cap de la vergua, quar no nosera a lu aquo.	And keep away from the head of the hammer, for it will not be suitable for him.
E donc cura aquel am aquo que la plagua consolida de las polveras las quals havem recomtadas en le tractat de las polveras.	Then care for that with water which solidifies the powders we have mentioned in the treatise on the powders.
E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if it has been cut too much; and you follow the incisions made by someone else; then it will not be suitable for him.
E mays cura aquel am aquo que havem dit entro que sia sanat.	Then care for that with water which we said would heal.
Capitol .lviii.	Chapter LVIII.
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	On the Treatment of Urine Retained in the Bladder.
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Retention of urine in the bladder is caused by wind due to a cold or by heat; or by poison or meat; and similar to those which we have mentioned in the division on treatments for the disease.
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	And if the urine is not dissolved, and it has remained in the bladder because of a cold; then make the patient sit with his legs bent.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	Then place the feet of the patient on his two legs; and extend his abdomen by pushing down from above his two legs; and tighten the bandage around him as much as possible.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	Then, when the neck of the bladder is tightened; then the passage behind will be opened up, so that the urine will be voided.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	If the urine is not dissolved by water which we have mentioned; then make an extraction from him with an instrument called a syringe, of which this is the shape: It should be made of silver and fine leather, such as a leather tube with a long pipe at its end, similar to a palm tree in shape; and the pipe should be fine in thickness at its tip.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	And the way of extracting the urine from him is that you should double the bag and fasten it on the edge of the tube by a good knot; then introduce the end of the tube into the opening of the bladder, and cut with scissors if there is any excess of the leather; and then insert it into the urethra with force.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	Then make the patient lie down on his back; and immerse the bladder in water, and oil of olive and vinegar.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	Then insert the tube with ease up to the root of the bladder; and then double the tube over at its end; and then introduce it into that which will go up to the bladder, and that should be done in the order mentioned above, except for meat which goes against the flow.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	Then let the bag fall slowly from the leather; because urine cuts the leather short.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	Then extract that and treat with urine; and use a syringe, not making it too full so as to cause pain; but relieve the bladder with a syringe, and then make the patient comfortable.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter LIX.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	On the Quality of Bladder-washing with a Cliff-bed and Similar Instruments.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When the bladder becomes infected or develops an ulcer; or is cut by a sharp object, and you want to distil water and medicines in it; then use an instrument called a cliff-bed, which has this shape:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	it should be solid at its end, so that it is closed.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in it three holes: two from the first hole; and then three times.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	In the beginning it is a round shape, in which it is said that water is trapped; and according to its quantity, add what is needed for it; but when any cause causes it to expel moisture, let it be expelled with water; and when it is expelled far away, according to the quality of the cliff-bed, which is painted with tar in the battles at sea.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	Then, when you want to add moisture to the bladder; introduce the end of the cliff-bed into the moisture, and throw water at it which is thrown up by it; because the moisture is thrown into the concave part of the cliff-bed.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	Then introduce the end of the cliff-bed into the tube according to what we have mentioned in the syringe; and then add moisture with water which will be thrown up by it; because that moisture will reach the bladder as much as possible, and the urine will be passed out with it.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	The shape of the delicate instrument for bladdery is like this:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	It should be made of silver or leather, the tip being rounded or similar to a small feather; and the tube should be fine in thickness inside.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	Then make the bladder move; and add to it the moisture you want to crystallize in the bladder; and then introduce that into a double bag with a tight knot; and heat that humidity over fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	Then introduce the end of the tinhter into the tube.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	Then press your hand on your back with the moisture over the bladder; and that should be done so that the urine is passed out with it.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	If you do not have a bladder, then make a circle of rope; and pierce it all around; and then introduce the double bag into those holes, so that it is twisted and tied; and then add to it the moisture with which you want to treat; and then pour oil and water.
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	Then you should tie that up with the instrument; and make it in such a way as to fit the bladder, and express it so that the moisture reaches the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter LVI.
De extraccio de peyra.	On the Extraction of Urine.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already mentioned in the division on urinary disorders and treatments with medicines, and the difference between urine produced in the lungs and that produced in the bladder, and the signs of the latter.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	We have mentioned urine which is produced by a catarrh; and also that which is produced by an operation.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	Urine produced in the bladder itself is that which is retained in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	There are four kinds of urine: that which is kept in the bladder, that which is produced by a catarrh and is not retained; that which is produced by an operation; and that which is produced by a fever.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	Then say that urine produced in the bladder is mostly in children; and of its signs is that the urine passed from the bladder is similar to water in its subtlety, and appears like sand; and the patient's bowels move with a noise like that made by a horse's hoove; and then it appears as if there were drops of blood in it.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it takes a long time for children who have had this disease to be cured, and difficult cure in the old.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	But in young people is partly cured by water because it is among them.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And of that for which the pain is greater and the cure is slower; And if it is little, it is contrary to that.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Therefore, as we approach the cure of that, let us begin with the preparation mentioned above for the treatment of the disease; because that injury prevents some wounds from being infected by the disease through inspection.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	Then return the hernia to the patient's feet and press it and wrap it well so that the pain does not go down to the groin of the bladder, or jump from place to place.
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	Then make a cut between them well prepared, and the cushions of the patient are left there, so that the whole bladder is lowered to the area where the hernia was removed.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	Then return it all there.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	Therefore, if you feel the pain in that area, then immediately lie down on your back with a cut above it.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul. De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	Of woman's pain.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Pain in women is rare.

De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	Of section on hernia.

Capitol .lxix.	Chapter .lxxxix.
De castracio.	Of castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration is forbidden by our law, more so because it involves the removal of an organ important for reproduction; therefore, it is necessary to recall this practice only in two cases. The first is when it is necessary to determine whether a person has been poisoned by another; the second is when we need to castrate other animals for their benefit and for our own, such as pigs, horses, or animals similar to them.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And therefore I say that castration should be done in two ways: either by cutting the testicles off or by making a section with a scalpel.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	More so in that which is done by cutting off the testicles, the path of the operation is that you make a cut on the animal's tail, so that the testes are soft and loose and hanging down.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	Then take those with your hand within so that they are firm and do not appear with the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	More so in castration by a cut and section, cover that you have the animal and press the skin of the testes with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	Then remove the suspensory, and sew on each side with a single suture so that the two sides are joined together.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	Then sew up those pustules that you may have torn.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave any sutures over the cipha for a long time, but rather remove the sutures from the cipha slowly.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	This method of castration is better because it is done by cutting off the testicles, and thus there is no cause for the animal to desire coition.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	Then treat the wound within so that it heals.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter.lxxx.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	Of the treatment of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men is due to two causes: the first is when the space between the testes is cut off or narrowed down, which produces a female figure because there are no testes; the second cause is when there are both male and female genitalia present.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And some of those who suffer from hermaphroditism have urine in their testes.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	More so in women is one kind: and that is because the woman's genitals are located below the testes, which are of a man; but the female's genitals and two testes are above them.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	The treatment is of three kinds: with two men and one woman.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	And it is because you should sew those parts together so that the odor of that person does not remain, and then treat those with a treatment for other wounds.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	In the second kind of man, in which there is urine in the testes, there is neither treatment nor operation for him.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter.xxi.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of piercing and flesh-eating because of women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Piercing that is strong and natural should be done with care so as not to cause harm, and it can be done if necessary for certain reasons; some women also have flesh-eating due to a certain infection that causes it to spread, and thus it is necessary to treat it with care.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Then remove the excess of piercing with your hand or with oil, and sew up.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not leave it unsown, especially at the base of the hair, so that it does not cause a flow of blood.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	Then treat those with a treatment for wounds within so that they are healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	More so in the case of raw flesh is flesh that grows out from within it, and it is strong enough to break away according to the appearance of hair; therefore, we should sew those parts with sutures as we do with piercing, and then treat them with a treatment for wounds within so that they are healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter.lxxii.
De curacio de alratica.	Of the treatment of biliousness.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Biliousness is when a woman's genitals are not pierced or are slightly pierced.
E es o natural o accidental.	It is either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is due to the malady that preceded it, and that person is caused by raw flesh or a subtle or strong suspension.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	It is done either in the base of the mother or between her legs or in the pus above or below her; it is prohibited to go out or to engage in sexual activity or to get pregnant, and it is strong enough to prohibit these things.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	The knowledge of that person is acquired by careful observation of the mother, if the opposition is apparent, probably so; but if it is not apparent, then carefully question that person with the fingers or with a stick.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	More so if the opposition is by a subtle suspension, and it is between the two lips, then carefully cut and break it up.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	It is because you pause between the two lips with your fingers, and then pause the stick that points to either side in front of them.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	The woman is on her side, with her legs spread open, and then carefully cut the subtle suspension that has broken out and the opposition that has opened up.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	Then take wool and sew it on with oil and pause that person in place, and mark the spot with a man each day so that the place does not become fixed.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	More so if the suspension is thick and strong, then sew it up with a blade of iron or with a leaf of mirra.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	More so if the opposition is due to raw flesh, then hang that person by a rope, and sew it up.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And they bring to you medicines that stop the flow of blood due to a bite, as well as headache, and blood of dragon, and ences, adjusted to milk of one side.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	Then administer a wide, blunt cannula made of lead so that the wound does not become fixed quickly.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	Hold that person for several days and administer a warm compress.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	Then treat that person with the other treatment of consolidation within so that it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	Sometimes in the native nature of other meats, and then sew up according to this method.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	More so if that is due to a seizure of crampy flesh, and the crampy flesh in the mother has not been caused by eating anything in a particular way.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter.lxxiii.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	Of the treatment of hemorrhoids and of the pain that occurs in the female's genitals.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are those of the orifices of small veins that occur within, and when they are caused by the continuous flow of blood, they are painful; and when hemorrhoids are old, they are painful.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	I have already said in the division of these kinds into three classes: those who receive treatment and those who do not receive treatment.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Then I say that hemorrhoids and thrush are when they occur in the base of the mother and do not appear to be caused by anything; in those who do not receive treatment, there is no cure.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	May those who are in the mother's orifices where there is sensation, be treated.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And when you place the woman in a bath and rub her with scalding water, or with rough cloth, and cut those with razor blades.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	Then sprinkle on them the blood of a lamb from one of the powders that you have cut with poison, thus in an instant and like a shadow, they will escape.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	Then tie their feet for an hour, and then place them into boiling water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the blood continues to flow, then prepare for them a decoction of mustard and of scorching pepper and of garbanzo and of other things.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	Then take flour from the oven and mix it with honey and vinegar, and make a paste with water on their two hands.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the blood has been cut off, then it is well; and otherwise, make them adhere to two vents, and make a cutting on their nipples.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then take wool and immerse them in the juice of coriander or in the juice of arnica or in the honey of honeysuckle until it is well, and then treat the wound with ointment; and then treat the wound with oil within that it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	May those who are in rough treatment, if you treat them with water that is cold to your skin after the second time that I have mentioned in my instruction.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then treat that within it is healed.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter. 57.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Of the piercing of the birthmark on the mother.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Special kinds of birthmarks come to the mother, such as warts and pustules and ulcers and scabs and sores and other birthmarks.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already mentioned these diseases and the kinds of those and their remedies in the division.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And if you ask me in this treatise about the piercing of the mother's birthmark that you heal when it is born, and if you want to know how to perform the operation.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Then consider if the pain of the birthmark in its beginning is acute with percussion and fever, and sometimes that swelling, then do not pierce it, and treat that with water that helps with maturity until the acuteness of the accident passes.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	Then when you have made the woman lie on a platform that has two platforms; and she leans on her two feet and spreads her legs, and pauses her hands below her belly, and ties one to another with a rope that is convenient.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	Then the midwife follows from the right side and administers the instrument with which she pierces the mother's orifice, the shape of which will be determined according to those causes that you will do.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And when you want to administer this instrument, then place the midwife's hand on the woman' s belly, and that with which the instrument enters into the mother is not more than the midwife' s hand and the patient' s belly.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	If the instrument is larger than the midwife' s hand, then place powder on the texture of the hand of the midwife so that it is prohibited for the instrument to enter into the hand of the midwife.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And when you place the vessel that is on the right side and that the minister holds the instrument, and turns the vessel until it enters into the mother' s orifice.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	And when the excitement occurs, and it is touched with the hand and it is wet, then do not cut off those deves from the head of the patient with a sharp blade.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the pain has been relieved, then place on the skin a warm cloth soaked in rose oil or green oil and leave it until the scar is white.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	Then wash the mother's hair with clean wool dipped in water in which lavender flowers have been boiled.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then it is healed after two days by applying to it the ointment that you mix with water until it is well.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	Some women wash the mother and the baby with water in which honey has been dissolved, and apply to it the oil of a long-hair plant, and return to the ointment.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the pain is within the mother who has been washed, then do not pierce it, treating that with water that I have mentioned in the division.
Capitol .lxxv.	Chapter. 57.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	Teaching midwives how to apply the piercings of the mother’s birthmark in a natural way when they are pregnant according to the following figure.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	A necessary cause is that the midwife recognizes in the beginning of the delivery of a natural child by signs of her, and it is when you see the woman express herself with open legs and smell the air, and over that is covered by water that comes to her from the part, and hurry up the birth, then know that this part is a second natural figure, and its expression on her head, and the second one hanging or suspended from her navel.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	Then when you see those signs, then know that the mother’s belly is contracting so that the embryo may drop slightly from her head, and give it to her the second time, and it is shaped by those superfluities with good shaping.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu .i., o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	Then that other part is not natural and not worthy, because when the embryo is expressed on its legs and the navel is expressed in front of her head and her legs, and the mother’s hand on one side or on her neck, for example: or is expressed on her head and the mother’s hand, or is hung on her navel, and hard it turns over her shoulder, and like those not worthy figures.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	A necessary cause is that the midwife be wise and subtle in all these causes, and keep from error and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And I have shown you all the figures, and which one is in those because it is signified by water and stands on it.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the birth is expressed on her head by natural excellence, and that is violent to the woman and difficult, and sometimes its virtue has been weakened, then make a cut on her, or what the women have, evaporate her hair with fenugrec powder and olive oil.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	Then the midwife enters between her two legs and cuts it slightly with a small knife, or dry that with her fingers until it is well.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	Then press the mother’s belly until the birth occurs.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	If it does not express, then the woman is crisped with mucilage of seeds and mucilage of fenugrec in dressmaking.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	Then order it, and order that it be crisped, and have her sneeze, and keep her mouth and nose closed for an hour, because the birth is often delayed.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if the two more of the birth are sneezing at the beginning, then reduce those with ease little by little.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	If you do not obey the instrument, then place the woman on a platform and raise her legs, and if it is difficult to get up, then tie her feet to the platform; and the woman should be held so that she does not fall down.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the two more are not turning inside out and killing the birth, then cut those off and pull the baby from its navel with equanimity, because that birth is often delayed.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	From the emergence of the embryo on its feet.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the fetus emerges on its feet, then cover it with something to keep it warm and, little by little, turn the fetus over, and then tie it, and then take one of its feet and stretch it little by little.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	Mayst when it is born between the legs, then order that it be pressed and made to vomit; for if God wills it, there will be no need of an abortion.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not born in that way, then return the small fetus little by little until you place it according to its natural figure; for if it is returned like that, it will be born in the wrong way.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is forbidden to cut in all places that I have recommended, then take a line of oil and a solution of salt, and strike it all together well, and place the thread of the cord from the woman's pubic bone, the lowest part of her belly.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	Then make that cut in running water, so as to achieve a good incision.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when the openings of its legs become less painful, then make it sweat with mint and apply pressure to them.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And when the sweating stops for an hour, then make it cut on a cutting board, and then make it sneeze and open its mouth; remove what comes out, and press little by little at the lower opening of the woman' belly, because the fetus will soon be born.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	The emergence of the fetus on its feet and its hands.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the fetus emerges according to this form, then you place its feet little by little; and the woman should lie on her side, with her feet raised, and hold her hands.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	Then press little by little on its belly, and extract what comes out from between its feet before it is ready to be born.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the fetus is not born in that way, then take its feet and move them violently; and press what is under the woman's belly little by little so that the fetus can come out through its openings.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	Then place its feet and tie the small fetus little by little; and order the woman to press herself little by little so that the fetus is not born in the wrong way.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	The emergence of the fetus in a lateral position hanging from one of its feet.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	Mayst be prepared for the woman to lie on her back; but if she cannot do so, then raise her and let her go down.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	And if she cannot go down, then make her lie on her back and strike with violence between her legs; and administer the remedies that I have recommended and that you know well.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	And if the child is born, then make it cut on a cutting board, and study its reduction; tie the fetus according to its natural figure, and make the woman sneeze and order her to press herself little by little so that she does not give birth in the wrong way.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	The emergence of the fetus on its back, with its feet and feet spread; its belly is against its mother's side.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	Mayst hold the child's body, and gently turn it little by little; and mayst do so with ease.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is tied, then place it on the string that I have recommended of oil and mucilages.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	Then order that it be pressed little by little, and when the eyes open, then make it cut on a cutting board and order that it be inclined to the right side, and order that it be pressed; and make it sneeze with ease.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	Exit of the fetus prepared over its side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When it is necessary to give birth to the fetus according to this method, then take care; and you shall cut the second one with your knife little by little until you achieve its evacuation of moisture.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is suspended over the woman' face and her neck, then you shall cut it with your knife so that it does not hang on and die.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	Then place the fetus in the openings from inside out until you stop it; and order the woman to press herself a few times, and if God wills, it will be born in the right way.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	Exit of twins or multiple fetus.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins are rare, and sometimes they are three or four; but this is strange, because there is a natural cause for it; but when there are more than four, they die in the womb.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And when it comes to the multiple fetus, know that they are often multiplied; one is born in the usual way through the mother' belly; another is born by natural delivery as a result of an accident; and some are born in the wrong way because they remain inside the womb too long.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if the delivery is difficult and it comes to water that I have mentioned because of the unusual figures, then take care of those as well because they are difficult to deliver.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the woman is subtle and gentle, and with patience, and is clever according to all figures; prepare it gently for her health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Remember that man is made from a fetus in the mother' womb; and he is born when it is ready.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some are formed in one, two, three, four, and five, and some are not formed until six, seven, eight, nine, ten, and a woman who has an abortion at six or more is said to have caused it with her hands.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And when this happens, mayst know that science is the reason for her strength because she was not afraid of that small appearance of water; and therefore pause there until you see it.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter LXVII.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On the Extracting of the Fetus When It is Dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you care for the dead fetus with water that I have mentioned in the division of medicine and it is not born, then certainly use an operation with force; but consider if the woman is of sound health or not; because it is a loss for her.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then the woman should lie on her back; and her feet raised, and her head inclined downward; and her legs separated.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	The minister should hold the child's two parts or its head in the woman' side so that it does not extend itself before the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	Then moisten the mouth of the mother with oil and a solution of salt, and of fenugrec and of the seed of fennel; and add to it.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	Then moisten the woman' body with these oils and solutions; then place her hand easily on the mother; and search for the child's head where its nails are.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And a convenient place in it: then consider if the fetus is prepared to cut its head off; and you shall cut its nails with your knife, or its neck, or its tongue, or its palate, or its beard, or its collarbone, or the places near its shoulders, or its sides.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if the release is over its feet, then place it in the penthouse; or between its shoulders.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And when he has the oil in his right hand, and sets the curve of his palm on that place between the fingers of his left hand, and enters his hand with ease and keeps the oil in some of those places which we have said, before it reaches the cause of the pain.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	Then place and keep another oil in the position of his palm, or third if necessary, so that it is attracted by gravity, and not drawn out according to the recipe so much only.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And so it is useful at first, so that the inflammation of him is relieved thus as soon as it is made in depth the eradication of him.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And when in him that is between them that the extraction is softened; and if some part of him is retained, then when the mother unsets some of his fingers so as to say a word about it with oil, and enters them carefully and stirs them with those hands which we have said, and returns them into their place.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	And if the part of the fetus is outside, then the fingers are exchanged between the places which we have said, and made so that all the fetus is removed.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	And if the hand is inflamed on the other, and it is not possible to reduce that by the curvature of it, then when it is wrapped up well over that; and take out that part before all are removed, and cut that or at the joint of the hand or at the knee.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And so you can make the other hand and feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	And if the head of the fetus is large, or happens to it by the curvature in the inflammation, or is in the water, then when you enter between the fingers spined and cut off the head and extract the water, or dislodge that with an instrument which is called "alundat", the shape of which will come to the shapes of the other instruments in the chapter which is near this.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And in the same way if the fetus is of large head by nature: and then when you cut that with an awl or alundat, as we have said; and take out the bones with pliers.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is inflamed and curved by the furcula, then cut it in so that the moisture which is in the feet is poured out.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	And if not complicated, and does not obey to inflammation, then you cut the head soonest according that at your service is possible.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the entrails of the belly are pomphous or in him, then you cut that part in so that the moisture which is in it runs out.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	And if the fetus is on top of his feet, then the attraction of him is light and its direction to the mouth of the mother is also light.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	And if the fetus is curved by the belly and feet, then when you extract that with a cloth which you have wrapped around your hand, and cut the belly and feet in so that the water which is in them runs out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	And if the other members are still alive and turn back the head, then the mother puts her left hand; if the mouth of the mother is open, then she enters her hand in the front of it, and turns that to the mouth, and throws that with the fingers within, and throws those inside.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the mother is curved by swelling, and it happens to it by the juice which we have said, then when not disturbed it; in advance when administer a fluid that is moistening greatly.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And administer plasters; and follow the patient with water which softens and moistens.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the fetus is on top of his rib, then when possible it is, let him be cut out: and water which we have said to keep the live fetus.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if water is not possible, then cut that in pieces, and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	Then there is no cause remaining within the second.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have finished all your operation, then administer water which we have said of the cure in the swellings by swelling; and let those things happen to the mother which happened before.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if it happens a flow of blood from the mouth, then send that in strict water and administer the other cure.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have already seen a woman in her womb which had a dead fetus, and another child was found to be pregnant on that same day; and the other was a dead fetus.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	And it happened soon to another woman who had a swelling in her womb by swelling, and it swelled within so that the fetus was raised up; and she began to feel pain.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to treat him, and I treated him for a long time, and the plague did not become fixed.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	And then I put on him a few plasters of strong attraction, and drew out an arm, and passed some time, and drew out another arm; and I was astonished at this, for in the womb there was no arm.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	And then I cured the plague, and extracted from him some bones; for the existing woman in her own mind, and I have worked with that method for a long time, and corrected that little arm.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not consider it strange, but that water has science and helps to the mother's illness which is treated by artificial means.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	From the shapes of the instruments which are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Shape of turning around with which the mother is turned around:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the shape of strength in which the points are fitted, and by that fitting the points are two turns in two ends of a spike; and it is used to turn the skin around.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	And yet this turn is useful when it is put gently with caution; and it is made or of wheat or of oats or of barley.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the length of each stalk is a palm and a half; and the width of each is a palm and a quarter, and the height of each is a palm and a little less. And the lengths of those two stalks are adjusted to that same type of stalk which is already closed, of which the lengths are the greater part of a palm and a little less, and the widths are two palms, or a little less.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two additions are inserted into the mouth of the mother so that it is opened by those two prescribed turns; and you make those turns with your hands.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Other shape similar to that more subtle and more light:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Be made of wood or of iron according to appearance.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at the end of it there are two additions, and the length of these additions is a palm, and their width is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to cover the lower part, then place your hand between the legs so that they are hanging down, and make a cut here.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	Then return your hand to the instrument in such a way that it is grasped according to the quantity you want of the mouth of the mother opening so that the needle makes its passage that you wish.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The shape of the turn, which they said the ancients:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Shape of a push, which is pushed by a push:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Shape of a hammering, which is hammered on the top head:
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	It is assembled with forceps at the end of it, several times, and some are forged long with the same type of forceps according to this shape, several times, which are dented here and there on the part that is to be cut, and marked and contoured.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Shape of a small hammering:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Shape of an unsharpened awl:
